entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 March 2023
